title: CrowdStrike FDR - Account & Privilege Changes
description: This dashboard provides visibility into account creation, deletion, and privilege modifications, highlighting user account lifecycle changes and group membership updates.

definition.content:
**[Crowdstrike FDR](https://www.crowdstrike.com/en-us/resources/data-sheets/falcon-data-replicator/)** enables continuous export of raw Falcon security telemetry to AWS S3 storage. It provides scalable access to endpoint, network, and identity events for integration with SIEM.

This dashboard provides visibility into account creation, deletion, and privilege modifications, highlighting user account lifecycle changes and group membership updates.

For more information, see the [Crowdstrike FDR Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/crowdstrike_fdr/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

search.query: source:crowdstrike-fdr @evt.name:(UserAccountCreated OR UserAccountDeleted OR UserAccountAddedToGroup OR UserAccountRemovedFromGroup) $Event-Platform $Event-Name $User-Name $Sensor-ID $Sensor-IP
